shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the SDK decodes the first remote audio frame for playback.

dlentry.dd: From v3.0.0. This callback is deprecated. Please use instead.

section.p:
This callback is triggered in either of the following scenarios: There are two scenarios:
The remote user joins the channel and sends the audio stream.
The remote user stops sending the video stream and re-sends it after 15 seconds. The remote user stops sending the audio stream and re-sends it after 15 seconds. Reasons for such an interruption include:
The remote user leaves channel.
The remote user drops offline.
The remote user calls the method to stop sending the audio stream
The remote user calls the method to turn off the audio

plentry.pd: The delay from the local user call until the callback is triggered, in milliseconds.
